Privacy.title: Pol√≠tica de Privacidad
Privacy.intro: En Kingston Care Connect, tu privacidad no es una ocurrencia tard√≠a, es nuestra arquitectura central.

points.noTracking: Sin Rastreo: No usamos Google Analytics, Facebook Pixels, ni ning√∫n rastreador de terceros.
points.noCookies: Sin Cookies: No almacenamos datos personales en cookies.
points.noLogging: Sin Registro de Consultas: Tus t√©rminos de b√∫squeda se procesan de forma an√≥nima.

overview.title: Privacy Policy Overview
overview.content: Kingston Care Connect ("KCC", "we", "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
**Information You Provide**
- **Feedback Forms**: Information you verify or report.
- **Partner Portal**: Organization details for partners.

**Information Collected Automatically**
- **Local Storage**: Preferences stored on your device.
- **Technical Data**: Standard server logs for security (no tracking).

**Information We Do NOT Collect**
- No search query logging
- No tracking cookies
- No analytics services
- We implement a Zero-Log Policy for your searches.

aiPrivacy.title: AI Assistant Privacy
aiPrivacy.content:
Our AI assistant runs entirely in your browser using client-side processing.
- **Zero Data Egress**: Queries never leave your device.
- **Zero-Knowledge**: We don't know what you discuss.
- **No Storage**: Conversations deleted on close.

useOfInfo.title: How We Use Information
useOfInfo.content:
We use information for:
- Service Improvement
- Partner Management
- Security

We do NOT use information for:
- Advertising
- Profiling
- Sale to third parties

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share information only with verified Partners (feedback) or Service Providers (hosting/database). We do NOT sell information.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Feedback is deleted after resolution (90 days). Partner data retained while active. Local storage is controlled by you.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.content: Under PIPEDA, you have rights to Access, Correction, Deletion, and Withdrawal of Consent. Contact privacy@kingstoncareconnect.ca.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement Encryption, Access Control, and Minimal Collection principles.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: KCC is not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: We use minimal cookies (NEXT_LOCALE for language). No tracking or advertising cookies.

About.governanceText: Esta plataforma se adhiere al Esquema de Gobernanza Kingston 150 (V7), asegurando que todos los datos de servicios est√©n verificados, categorizados y rastreados en su procedencia.

landAcknowledgment.title: Reconocimiento Territorial
landAcknowledgment.text: Kingston, conocida como Katarokwi, est√° situada en las tierras ancestrales y tradicionales de las confederaciones Huron-Wendat, Anishinaabe y Haudenosaunee. Reconocemos nuestra responsabilidad de honrar la tierra, el agua y el cielo con respeto y preservaci√≥n.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: English version available in Terms of Service.

serviceDescription.title: Description of Service
serviceDescription.content:
KCC is an information directory that provides contact information for social services in Kingston, Ontario. KCC does NOT provide: 
- Emergency services (for emergencies, call 911)
- Medical advice or healthcare services
- Legal advice or representation
- Financial advice or services
- Counseling or mental health treatment

KCC is a directory only. We do not operate, control, or endorse any services listed on this platform.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content:
THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT: 
- Service information is accurate, current, or complete
- Services listed are available, safe, or appropriate for your needs
- The platform will be uninterrupted or error-free

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, KINGSTON CARE CONNECT, ITS ORGANIZERS, CONTRIBUTORS, AND AFFILIATES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY.

emergency.title: Emergency Services Disclaimer
emergency.content: THIS IS NOT AN EMERGENCY SERVICE. If you are experiencing a life-threatening emergency, CALL 911 IMMEDIATELY. For a mental health crisis, CALL 988. Do not rely on this directory for emergencies.

advice.title: No Professional Advice
advice.content: Nothing on this platform constitutes professional advice of any kind, including but not limited to medical, legal, financial, or psychological advice. Always consult qualified professionals for specific concerns.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content:
By using KCC, you agree to:
- Verify all information directly with service providers
- Not rely solely on KCC information for critical decisions
- Report inaccurate information through our feedback system
- Use the Service only for lawful purposes

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Kingston Care Connect, its organizers, contributors, and affiliates from any claims, damages, losses, or expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising from your use of the Service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: KCC lists third-party services over which we have no control. We are not responsible for the availability, quality, or safety of listed services. Inclusion in this directory does not constitute endorsement.

ai.title: AI Assistant Disclaimer
ai.content: Our AI assistant uses a language model that may provide inaccurate or hallucinated information. The AI assistant is for informational purposes only. Always verify critical information. The AI assistant cannot provide emergency assistance.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of Ontario and the federal laws of Canada applicable therein.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms: legal@kingstoncareconnect.ca

Emergency.title: No es un Servicio de Emergencia
Emergency.inlineMessage: Este es solo un directorio de informaci√≥n. Siempre llame al 911 para emergencias.
Emergency.bannerMessage: Si est√° experimentando una emergencia que pone en peligro su vida, llame al 911 inmediatamente.

EmergencyModal.message: Si t√∫ o alguien m√°s est√° en peligro inmediato, llama a los servicios de emergencia. Usa tu tel√©fono para marcar los n√∫meros a continuaci√≥n.
EmergencyModal.disclaimer: Kingston Care Connect es solo un directorio de informaci√≥n. Estos enlaces intentar√°n marcar desde tu dispositivo.

AccessibilityPolicy.title: Pol√≠tica de Accesibilidad
AccessibilityPolicy.commitment: Kingston Care Connect is committed to ensuring equal access for people with disabilities.
AccessibilityPolicy.standards: We are committed to meeting the requirements of the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act (AODA) and the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA.

features.keyboard: Keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
features.skip: Skip-to-content links for screen reader users
features.responsive: Responsive design for all device sizes

plan.y2026: Maintain WCAG 2.1 AA compliance & quarterly audits
plan.y2027: Upgrade to WCAG 2.2 Level AA & external audit

feedback.intro: We welcome feedback on the accessibility of Kingston Care Connect. Please let us know if you encounter accessibility barriers:
feedback.formats: Information on this website is available in alternative formats upon request.

verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.content: We verify identity through email domain matching, phone verification, and public records. Fraudulent claims result in immediate termination.

accuracy.title: Accuracy Warranty
accuracy.content: You warrant that all information provided is accurate, current, and not misleading.

license.title: License Grant
license.content: You grant KCC a non-exclusive license to display and share your organization's information.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this partnership. KCC may terminate for terms violation or inaccurate info.

ContentPolicy.title: Pol√≠tica de Contenido
ContentPolicy.description: Our guidelines for maintaining a safe community directory.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Content
prohibited.content: Spam, hate speech, and fraudulent info are strictly prohibited.

submissions.title: User Submissions
submissions.content:
When submitting services or feedback to KCC:

  • All submissions are reviewed by our team before publication (except for immediate feedback which is internal).
  • We reserve the right to edit submissions for clarity, length, and formatting (while maintaining accuracy).
  • We reserve the right to reject submissions that do not meet our inclusion criteria or violate this policy.

reporting.title: Reporting Process
reporting.content:
If you encounter problematic content:

  • Use the 'Report Issue' button found on every service listing page.
  • For privacy or safety concerns, email privacy@kingstoncareconnect.ca.
  • We aim to review and respond to reports within 5 business days.
  • You may report content anonymously, though providing contact info helps us verify the claim.

appeals.title: Appeals Process
appeals.content:
If your listing submission was rejected or your content removed:

  • You may appeal the decision by contacting moderation@kingstoncareconnect.ca.
  • Please provide specific evidence supporting your appeal (e.g., official website links, registration documents).
  • Final decisions are made by the KCC Governance Committee.
